sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ ngOnInit(){ console.log('AppComponent.ngOnInit()'); } constructor() { console.log('AppComponent.constructor()'); } title = 'tp3final'; lessonPackage: any; }
